mapper.insert: insert into chatrooms(chatroom_id, member_id, last_active_time) values(#{chatRoomId},#{memberId},sysdate)
mapper.select: select chatroom_id, (case when last_active_time >= (systimestamp - interval '1' minute) then '방금' when last_active_time >= (systimestamp - interval '1' hour) then extract(minute from (systimestamp - last_active_time)) || '분 전' when last_active_time >= (systimestamp - interval '24' hour) then extract(hour from (systimestamp - last_active_time)) || '시간 전' when last_active_time >= (systimestamp - interval '10' day) then extract(day from (systimestamp - last_active_time)) || '일 전' else to_char(last_active_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') end) as last_active_time, last_active_time as order_time from chatrooms where member_id = #{memberId} order by order_time desc

select chatroom_id, member_id, (case when last_active_time >= (systimestamp - interval '1' minute) then '방금' when last_active_time >= (systimestamp - interval '1' hour) then extract(minute from (systimestamp - last_active_time)) || '분 전' when last_active_time >= (systimestamp - interval '24' hour) then extract(hour from (systimestamp - last_active_time)) || '시간 전' when last_active_time >= (systimestamp - interval '10' day) then extract(day from (systimestamp - last_active_time)) || '일 전' else to_char(last_active_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') end) as last_active_time, last_active_time as order_time from chatrooms order by order_time desc
select member_id from chatrooms where chatroom_id = #{chatRoomId}
mapper.update: update chatrooms set last_active_time = sysdate where chatroom_id = #{chatroomId}
